0011001110000001 1011000011101010 1 -> sum: 1110010001101100, cout: 0
1000011001011010 0000000101001010 0 -> sum: 1000011110100100, cout: 0
1001010011001000 0011000111001100 1 -> sum: 1100011010010101, cout: 0
0100101011010010 0110110110000101 1 -> sum: 1011100001011000, cout: 0
1110010001110110 0100010001110010 1 -> sum: 0010100011101001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
